Class Dispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iliashenko.Dispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WatchDogBus, WatchDogTime

    public class Dispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements WatchDogBus, WatchDogTime
    Class that make reacts on all notifies from buses and. It controll creation buses threads for every route.

    26-02-2019

    0.1
